name: DESASTROID
description:
GAMEPLAY Earth in danger , You are in a Spaceship and your mission is to protect Earth from coming Astroids , you have one minute to do that while the earth can take 3 hits to be destroyed . do your best :) HOW TO PLAY

* AIM WITH CURSOR

* SHOOT WITH [ LEFT MOUSE BUTTON ]

RESOURCES

GAME ENGINE : UNITY

DESIGNS : ASPRITE , ADOBE PHOTOSHOP

SOUND EFFECTS : SFXR , BEEPBOX
